The 'Australian College of Pharmacy' (The College) is one of two providers of
continuing professional development (CPD) programmes for pharmacists in
Australiaâthe other being The Pharmaceutical Society of Australia (PSA). The
College has been educating Australian Pharmacists' since 1978. The College is
the second largest organisation in the Australian industry, behind the PSA but
larger than The Pharmacy Guild of Australia.

Members of The College are entitled to use the postnominal MACP, Associate
Fellows AFACP, while Fellows of the College are entitled to use the
prestigious FACP.
